title: Shrimp and Pasta in Lemon Cream Sauce
directions: Combine shrimp, sauce, lemon juice and lemon peel in small saucepan. Heat over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until heated through (do not boil).
Serve over pasta. Sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) package BUITONI Refrigerated Light Four Cheese Ravioli, prepared according to package directions
1 (10 ounce) container BUITONI Refrigerated Light Alfredo Sauce
